content: dirty deeds done to sheep gloves make 2 materials needed caron simply soft in black 5 00 mm crochet hook h directions with black yarn and size h hook chain 18 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 17sts chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in first stitch *ch1 skip next stitch single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * all the way across 3 chain 1 turn 2sc in each chain 1 space across single_crochet in last stitch 4 repeat row 2 and 3 until cuff fits snugly around your wrist i did this step 12 times for my size medium gloves 5 fold the cuff in half and join with a row of 17 single_crochet the sides with 17 stitches equal the length of the glove and then turn the cuff inside out this side will be the right side this next part will be work in rounds 6 single_crochet all the way around the top of the cuff the top will be the end your hook is already on for my gloves i did 28 single_crochet all the way around 12 of row 4 + 1 of row 2/3 combined + row 1 =14 then multiply 14x2 to get 28 so use this basic idea if you change my stitch counts to get your stitch count for this step join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet all the way around join with a slip_stitch x3 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet all the way around do not join x8 9 ch1 turn single_crochet all the way around join with a single_crochet to first single_crochet 10 ch1 turn single_crochet all the way around join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 11 ch1 turn single_crochet all the way around join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet and tie off finishing 1 join yarn in any stitch at the bottom end of the cuff 2 single_crochet one row all the way around the bottom edge of the cuff join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet and tie off 3 try on glove note which stitches fall on your knuckles mark 2 stitches for each knuckle and then do the knuckle detailing knuckle detailing 1 join yarn in any stitch in the palm 2 ch2 half_double_crochet around until you reach the stitches you marked half_double_crochet in the stitch directly before the first 2 marked stitches one knuckle chain 2 skip the next two stitches half_double_crochet in next st chain 2 skip the next two stitches half_double_crochet in next st chain 2 skip the next two stitches half_double_crochet in next st chain 2 skip the next 2 stitches half_double_crochet in next stitch and continue half_double_crochet around until you reach the first half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch at the top of the first chain 2 3 chain 1 single_crochet around until you reach the last stitch before the first chain 2 space single_crochet in this stitch 3 single_crochet in chain 2 space skip the half_double_crochet 3
